channel.title: Civilization on Codex Detrux
channel.description: Recent content in Civilization on Codex Detrux

item.title: Civilizations #4: Neolithic as pioneer of modern lifestyle
item.description: The Neolithic is the final period of the entire stone age, also known as the new stone age (νέος, néos, new + λίθος, líthos, stone).

item.title: Civilizations #3: Mesolithic and emergence of pottery
item.description: The Mesolithic is a transitional period between the Paleolithic and Neolithic.

item.title: Civilizations #1: Stone
item.description: Lithos #Paleolithic, Mesolithics and Neoliths are terms that refer to one age, the Stone Age.

item.title: Civilizations #2: Paleolithic
item.description: The Paleolithic period began from the c.
